text: Kavar (, also Romanized as KavƒÅr; also known as Kaval) is a city and capital of Kavar County, Fars Province, Iran. == References == ==Other websites== *http://sasanika.org/esasanika/qalatqobad- fort-a-sasanian-islamic-fort-in-kavar-southeast-of-shiraz/ Category:Cities in Fars Province
title: Kavar
